item.title: Stocks tumble as tariff fallout roils markets
item.description: A selloff on Thursday erased some of the gains a day earlier.

item.title: WATCH: Golden retriever takes 'retriever' identity very seriously
item.description: Brooks the golden retriever loves collecting sticks and is determined to carry a massive stick home through the streets of Charleston, South Carolina.

item.title: Number of Americans filing for jobless benefits falls as labor market remains sturdy
item.description: Applications for U.S. jobless benefits fell last week as the labor market remains sturdy ahead of an expected purge of federal government employees

item.title: Trump preparing executive order to dissolve Department of Education: Sources
item.description: President Trump is expected to direct his secretary of education to dissolve the Department of Education by executive order this week, sources said.

item.title: WATCH: 'Lavanado' spotted spinning as Kilauea volcano erupts in Hawaii
item.description: The latest eruption of the Kilauea volcano in Hawaii brought more than tall bursts of fiery red lava and billowing smoke: A so-called "lavanado" was s...
